title: net neutrality in danger
body:
whats net neutrality?! and why is it in danger?! 

tl;dr it is the reason why u can play with good latency at low costs, pls watch the video for more info

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K88BU3kjZ-c&t=4s

send a letter to the FCC https://www.battleforthenet.com/

participating partys https://www.battleforthenet.com/july12/ (however some of the partys protest rather shy and u hv to look very closely to see their protest, i am especially disapointet in reddit, they only hv a banner that shows their protest and provides a link and it is to easy to overlook it, pls help by sending a letter https://www.battleforthenet.com/ )
